name: com.magmaflowgames.framework
author: Magma Flow Games
description:
A comprehensive framework for building games in Unity; 
- object pooling
- event management
- extensions
- utilities
- minimal profiling

Documentation can be found at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_v2yFBbT9sble8bZTTgPfpZOcjiiAbKannSIF90Vvc4/edit?usp=sharing
